page.title: 12SHOPPING CENTRE
page.content: SHOPPING CENTRE_AN INTERVIEW 1)"WHAT IS YOUR OPINION OF THE NEW SHOPPING CENTRE AND RANGE OF SHOPS?""IT IS AN IMPROVEMENT."2)"DO YOU FIND THE RANGE AND QUALITY OF STORES ADEQUATE OR DO YOU FIND THAT YOU HAVE TO GO FURTHER AFIELD?""THEY ARE MORE THAN ADEQUATE WITH AN ABUNDANCE OF GREENGROCERS AND TWO SUPERMARKIETS."3)"ARE THE BUTCHERS ADEQUATE?""THEY ARE GOOD."4)"IS IT POSSIBLE TO BUY MAJOR PURCHASES HERE?""I HAVE TO GO TO BRIGHTON OR CRAWLEY."5)"WHAT ARE PRICES LIKE?""THEY ARE FAIR."6)"IS CAR PARKING ADEQUATE?""THERE ARE A LOT OF CAR PARKS."7)"WHAT IS YOUR OVERALL VIEW OF HAYWARDS HEATH?""WE NEED MORE CLOTHES AND FABRIC SHOPS."
